packages.name: connect-jwt
packages.description: Json Web Tokens, securely sign tokens containing information and verify tokens that you have signed.

packages.description: Mongodb integration. MongoDB is a No-SQL popular database, and allows you save your data easily.

packages.description: Redis integration for caching and in-mem storage.

packages.description: Create and manage docker containers and images with CONNECT.

packages.name: connect-postgres
